div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 994 Khristoforovka, Bashtanka raion, Ni- kolaev oblast, Ukraine, before 1913 Burial: late 6th-5th cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AE. In barrow (near burial?) Olbia: fish-shaped AE (anepigraphic [3]; as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 6 [2]) Disposition: museum material lost during war Goshkevich, Letopis' Khersonskogo gorodskogo muzeia drevnostei Khersonskogo kraia za 1913 g., issue 5 (Kherson, 1915), p. 18
